Package com.henrikhedberg.ohap

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinaryDevice
    A concrete device with a binary presentation.
    Container
    A container holding items.
    DecimalDevice
    A concrete device with a decimal presentation.
    Device
    An abstract device that an be either an actuator or a sensor.
    HbdpOhapServer
    Open Home Automation Protocol (OHAP) server with HBDP backend.
    IncomingMessage
    Parses an incoming OHAP message.
    Item
    A base object holding all common properties of an item.
    OhapServer
    Open Home Automation Protocol (OHAP) server.
    OhapSession
    Open Home Automation Protocol (OHAP) server-side session.
    OutgoingMessage
    Builds an outgoing OHAP message.
    TcpOhapServer
    Open Home Automation Protocol (OHAP) server with TCP backend.
